message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for $20,000. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $17,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
